releases.title: Uncrustify 0.82.0
releases.description:
### Pre compiled binaries for Windows

64 bits: [uncrustify-0.82.0_f-win64.zip](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/23565853/uncrustify-0.82.0_f-win64.zip)

32 bits: [uncrustify-0.82.0_f-win32.zip](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/23565856/uncrustify-0.82.0_f-win32.zip)

### Source code
[uncrustify-0.82.0.tar.gz](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/23565857/uncrustify-0.82.0.tar.gz)
[uncrustify-0.82.0.zip](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/23565858/uncrustify-0.82.0.zip)

### Building from source

Please refer to the [build](https://github.com/uncrustify/uncrustify#build) section in the README file for instructions on how to build Uncrustify from source.
